summary: The module defines a suite of unit tests that validate DPAPI (Data Protection API) operations such as encrypting and decrypting credential blobs, handling master keys, and processing vault schemas using the impacket library. It also provides auxiliary utilities for data protection and binary parsing to support the tests.
business_intent: To verify the correctness and robustness of DPAPI-related functionality in the impacket toolkit, ensuring secure handling of Windows credentials and vault data for downstream security and forensic applications.
